@graph.name: Machine-actionable Software Management Plans
@graph.description: This dataset corresponds to machine actionable Software Management Plans which is an extension of the RDA machine-actionable Data Management Plan (maDMP) application profile and its corresponding DMP Common Standard ontology (DCSO) in order to cover the case of ELIXIR Software Management Plans (SMP). This includes its metadata and has a list, via hasParts of its outcomes.

@graph.name: Metadata model for machine-actionable Software Management Plans: Software
@graph.description: This is the software source code facilitating the creation of a metadata model for machine actionable software management plans along with its metadata.
@graph.citation: Giraldo O, Geist L, Quiñones N, Solanki D, Rebholz-Schuhmann D, Castro LJ. machine-actionable Software Management Plan Ontology (maSMP Ontology). Zenodo; 2023. doi:10.5281/zenodo.8089518

@graph.name: maSMP Ontology
@graph.description: This is an ontology representing the metadata elements of a maSMP along with its metadata.
@graph.citation: Giraldo Olga, Geist Lukas, Quiñones Nelson, Solanki Dhwani, Rebholz-Schuhmann Dietrich, & Castro Leyla Jael. (2023). machine-actionable Software Management Plan Ontology (maSMP Ontology) (1.0.0). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.8089518
